name: TapTap! - Keyboard Simulator
description:
Do you love keyboard typing sound or clicker games?

If yes, this game created for you!

You can earn coins with typing. And you can change your clothings and room with coins.

Features

-Earning coins with typing
-Earning level with typing
-Improving your room with coins!
-Improving your clothings with coins!

Current Version: 0.2
